tag_list: divorce, separation, annullment, martial, relatonships, task-managment, organizing
overview:
Mom:CEO:Speaker, Post Divorce Specialist, Entrepreneur, loves to have fun.

splitpartners.com an online service site for people who going through divorce and need some help sorting out what to next after the legal process is over. The online tools are simple to use and makes the transition after divorce occurs easier to management. Go to splitpartners.com to get started.
